sentences.english: Catkins do know how to touch my hair.
I don't wish to bring his name down to the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 我不願意讓他的名聲受到塵沾垢污。

sentences.english: Each of us dipped a finger into the mixture and sucked it.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都把手伸進懷子裏沾一下並品嚐。

sentences.english: It is usually eaten with soy-bean sauce or orange sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在喫時多半沾醬油加蔥或桔醬。

sentences.english: Fold the thoughts and wiping open touch in canthus under that bit of tears.
sentences.chinese: 收起思緒，拭開沾在眼角下的那點淚花。

sentences.english: I thought it was probably neither.
sentences.chinese: 我想，它或許兩樣都不沾。

sentences.english: Oh, I say, so I'm sticking feathers up my butt.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我說，那我就是要把羽毛沾在屁股上。

sentences.english: Her exercise-book is stained with ink marks.
sentences.chinese: 她的練習本上沾了墨跡。

sentences.english: Gently the willow fluff wafts to the embroidered screen.
sentences.chinese: 遊絲軟系飄春榭，落絮輕沾撲繡簾。

sentences.english: Observation tells me that you have a little reddish mould adhering to your instep.
sentences.chinese: 觀察告訴我，你的鞋面上沾有一小塊紅泥。

sentences.english: Jack's shoes were caked with mud in a country road after a demonstrateer.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨過後走在城市小路上，傑克的鞋子上沾了些泥塊。

sentences.english: There was an egg , stained with chicken droppings , laying on the straw under the buttocks of the cock.
sentences.chinese: 它屁股底下的稻草上，有一枚沾着雞屎的雞蛋。

sentences.english: Tin dipping angle adjustable, provides even tin dipping in depths.
sentences.chinese: 沾錫之角度可調整，使沾錫深度準確平均。

sentences.english: The dog's fur was matted with blood.
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗的毛皮上沾有血跡。

sentences.english: The boy inked his clothes when he broke down the ink bottle.
sentences.chinese: 當他把墨水瓶打翻時，他的衣服上沾上了墨水。

sentences.english: On the rice straw under the cock's butt was an egg with some droppings.
sentences.chinese: 它屁股底下的稻草上，有一枚沾着雞屎的雞蛋。
